verbose_text: Interestingly, disinhibition of somatostatin positive interneurons has recently been suggested to mediate the long lasting antidepressant actions of selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRI), indicating a distinct inhibitory circuit logic may mediate rapid (PV-cells) or slow antidepressant effects [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: somatostatin-positive interneurons has recently been suggested to mediate the long-lasting antidepressant actions of selective serotonin
